org.openmuc.jdlms.client
Interface HlsSecretProcessor

public interface HlsSecretProcessor

Interface used to provide a manufacturer specific way for processing the secret with a given salt according to the high level authentication stated in IEC 62056-62 4.7.2 Pass 3 and 4. An example for processing the secret is appending the secret to the salt and generating a MD5 digest, which is returned as the result. Note that you do not have to implement this specific implementation, as it is one of the two standard methods provided by jDLMS by using ClientConnectionSettings.Authentication.HIGH_MD5.
